sentences.english: Dirk Kuyt and David Ngog are battling calf and back injuries respectively.
sentences.chinese: 庫伊特小腿有傷，恩格格則遭遇背部傷病。

sentences.english: Yet the enemys bullets hit the calf on the shi lei.
sentences.chinese: 然而敵人的子彈還是擊中了石磊的小腿。

sentences.english: Trousers should extend to cover two-thirds of the calves.
sentences.chinese: 衭子的長度應足以覆蓋小腿的三份之二。

sentences.english: The fish then went to work, nibbling away.
sentences.chinese: 然後魚去工作，一點一點地輕咬腳趾和小腿。

sentences.english: Then place one wrap behind the wings and around the hook shank.
sentences.chinese: 然後把背後的翅膀一裹，前後小腿鉤。

sentences.english: How is bloat of crus muscle part treated?
sentences.chinese: 小腿肌肉部分腫起怎麼治療？

sentences.english: Resistance bands can be used to do plyometric work that will strengthen the calf muscles.
sentences.chinese: 電阻帶可以用來做增強式的工作，將加強小腿肌肉。

sentences.english: The second hit his wife's calf.
sentences.chinese: 第二槍打中了她妻子的小腿。

sentences.english: Motor-driven push-rod design, adjust arbitrarily the angle of the crus and the back.
sentences.chinese: 電動推杆設計，任意調節小腿和靠背高低角度。

sentences.english: When crus fracture what OK and violent campaign?
sentences.chinese: 小腿骨折啥時可以劇烈運動啊？

sentences.english: Turn the shanks and baste them once or twice as they cook.
sentences.chinese: 將小腿肉翻一下，烹調時在上面抹一兩次油。

sentences.english: The team measured the length of the fibers in the calf muscles using ultrasound.
sentences.chinese: 研究團隊使用超音波來測量小腿肌肉的纖維組織長度。

sentences.english: Achilles (uh-KIL-eez) tendon rupture is an injury that affects the back of your lower leg.
sentences.chinese: 阿基里斯腱斷裂是一種影響小腿後部的損傷。

sentences.english: The calves are comprised of two muscles: the gastrocnemius and soleus.
sentences.chinese: 小腿肌羣包括腓腸肌和比目魚肌。

sentences.english: This builds your calves and sculpts your butt.
sentences.chinese: 這有賴於你的小腿和造型你的屁股。

sentences.english: You should feel a stretch in the middle of the calf.
sentences.chinese: 在做此動作時，小腿的中部要有拉脹感。

definition: knee/(Internet slang) to kneel down (in admiration)
lower half of one's body/Lower Body (Chinese poetry movement of the early 21st century)
